title: Predictions on The Future of Work: AI, The Gig Economy, and DEI
summary:
Kara and Scott are coming at you on a Wednesday with the first of three episodes in our special Future of Work series! They make predictions on whatâ€™s to come for the gig economy, DEI, and more. Is hybrid work here to stay? Will vocational training gain traction? How will AI impact the job market in the years to come?
